className.transform: const { gap = 'md', align = 'center' } = props; const gaps = { sm: 'gap-1', md: 'gap-2', lg: 'gap-3' }; const aligns = { start: 'items-start', center: 'items-center', end: 'items-end' }; const cn = (await import('@/lib/utils')).cn; return cn('flex', gaps[gap], aligns[align], props.className)
